description:
encoding/asn1: prepare for 64-bit ints

The code was assuming that int = 32 bits. Don't.

Update issue 2188.

messages.text: Seeing the CL description in my mailbox it sounds accusatory. It is not.

Hello agl1 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=44b9f2d5eb03 ***

encoding/asn1: prepare for 64-bit ints

The code was assuming that int = 32 bits. Don't.

Update issue 2188.

CC=golang-dev
